this doesn't have crack just a serial. You enter the serial for first time when you enter in game. When you restart your pc or unmount the Landwirtschafts.iso and you want to enter in game it will ask you for the CD. Just mount again Landwirtschafts.iso and there will be no problem. 

English version is announced on 6november.

@Matsjo115a; you have to use "virtual-drive"ware to mount the game ".ISO".  I use Alcohol52 when I can.  the game is cracked to be able to use "virtual-drive"'s but you still need to have the game file (.ISO) mounted.
